detail_desc: Hair decoration with fabric flowers and leaves on plastic-coated metal wire.
Calf-length skirt in woven fabric with buttons down the front, side pockets and a slit at the front. Unlined.

Round shoulder bag in grained imitation leather and imitation suede with a narrow, adjustable shoulder strap with a metal buckle and a zip at the top. One zipped outer compartment. Lined. Width 6 cm, diameter approx. 19.5 cm.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist, concealed zip in one side, fake welt pocket at the back and slim legs with slits at the hems.
Patterned shirt jacket in a cotton weave with a print motif on the back, a collar, zip down the front, chest pocket and buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.

Halterneck jumpsuit in a patterned weave with a V-neck at the front and ties at the back of the neck. Seam and detachable tie belt at the waist, side pockets, a concealed zip in one side and wide legs. Lined at the top.
Slim-fit jeans in stretch, supersoft twill with a sheen. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Short faux fur jacket with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the front and side pockets. Satin lining.
Hipster briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Fine-knit jumper in a soft viscose blend with long sleeves and wide lace trims at the cuffs and hem.
Round earrings in embossed metal. Length approx. 3.5 cm.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details in a relaxed fit with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, and tapered legs with printed side panels.
Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Shirt in airy cotton with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Trainers in imitation leather with a low shaft with a padded edge, lacing at the front and loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and TPR (thermoplastic rubber) soles.
Necklace with five metal chains in various designs, one with a round pendant. Adjustable length 37-44 cm.
Jumper in a soft knit with a round neck, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sequined, V-neck bralette with spaghetti shoulder straps and a zip at the back with a round tab. Jersey lining.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Cap in cotton twill with an inner sweatband and an adjustable metal fastener at the back.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Calf-length shirt dress in a viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, low dropped shoulders and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Seam at the waist with gathers at the front and elastication at the back, and a detachable tie belt. Unlined.
Wrapover off-the-shoulder dress in a viscose weave with narrow shoulder straps, long sleeves and a tie at the side. Unlined.
Shoulder bag with a metal chain shoulder strap, flap with a metal clasp and one inner compartment. Lined. Size 9x10x15 cm.
Twill cap with an appliqué on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Long T-shirt in slub cotton jersey in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Round neckline with a raw, roll edge, a chest pocket and a rounded hem at the front. Longer at the back.
Long dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck front and back and short butterfly sleeves. Elasticated seam with a drawstring at the waist. Lined.
Short dress in patterned jersey with narrow shoulder straps that cross and tie at the back, a double-layered bodice at the front, seam at the waist and gently flared skirt.
Top in soft, printed jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Earrings with plastic beads and tassels. Length 8.5 cm.

Lined bikini top with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Small frill trim at the top, a decorative bow with metal pendants at the front, ties at the back of the neck and a metal fastener at the back.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in washed, stretch denim with a high waist and zip fly and button. The cotton content of the skirt is partly recycled.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist, decorative drawstring, fake fly with buttons, and ribbed hems.
Hair elastics with metal decorations in the shape of flowers.
Waist-high bikini bottoms with wide sides and medium coverage at the back. Lined.
Trainers with a padded top edge and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Hi-tops with a foldable shaft and tongue in faux fur and lacing at the front. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Sporty jacket in sturdy jersey with a zip down the front and a mesh-lined hood with an elastic drawstring. Chest pocket with a concealed zip, side pockets, ribbed cuffs and narrow elastication at the hem.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Glittery metal hairclips with fruit-shaped appliqués. Length 4.5 cm.
Calf-length skirt in a pleated crêpe weave with a high waist, concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastening at one side, and a raw-edge hem.
Slim-fit jeans in different colours of superstretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets and narrow hems.
Cropped top in soft, printed cotton jersey with long sleeves.

Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a ribbed turtle neck. Relaxed fit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a motif. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Cropped, smocked top in woven fabric with a small frill trim at the top and bottom, and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.

Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y) with embroidered text inside the waistband, a zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow, cut-off, raw-edge hems.
Sun visor in braided paper straw with covered elastic at the back.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined, drawstring hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, fake pockets at the front, real pockets at the back and skinny legs.
Fine-knit polo-neck jumper in soft merino wool with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fitted T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey.
T-shirt in sturdy jersey made from a cotton blend with pin-tucks that create a striped pattern.
Knitted jacket with a soft thermal fleece lining, hood and small appliqué at the top. Zip down the front, side pockets and a contrasting colour jersey trim around the hood, pockets, cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey with a chest pocket.
5-pocket ankle-length trousers in washed stretch twill with a washed look, high waist, zip fly and slim legs.
Short-sleeved cotton jersey tops in various designs.
Short skirt in airy, crinkled plumeti chiffon with an elasticated waist that has a small frill trim at the top. Lined.

Short jacket in woven fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood and zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front. Long sleeves with elasticated cuffs, side pockets with a press-stud, and a drawstring hem. Lined.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams, a detachable hood and zip down the front. Front pockets and ribbed cuffs. Fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Short shorts in a viscose crêpe weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and decorative lace trims at the front and hems.
Long-sleeved jersey tops made from organic cotton.
Jumper knitted in supersoft chenille with long sleeves and narrow ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Set with a short-sleeved shirt and pair of trousers in a cotton weave and accessories. Shirt with a collar and buttons down the front. Trousers with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and a fake welt back pocket. Bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener. Detachable, adjustable braces with imitation leather details.

Wide tunic in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and wide, buttoned cuffs. Seam and flared peplum at the hem with a pleat at the front.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar and chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.

Set with a hooded jacket and pair of joggers in sweatshirt fabric and a T-shirt in jersey. Jacket with a jersey-lined hood, print motif on the front, and zip down the front with a chin guard. Joggers with wide elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, a print motif on the front, pockets in the side seams,a back pocket and ribbed hems. T-shirt with a round neck and a print motif on the front.
Jumper in rib-knit cotton with lace details and a lace-trimmed V-neck. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Calf-length dress in a patterned weave with a V-neck, adjustable spaghetti straps and slits in the sides. Lined.
Pull-on trousers in soft, washed denim with ribbing and a drawstring at the waist. Front and back pockets, a fake fly and elasticated hems.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and press-studs at the side and crotch.
Tunic in woven fabric with a pleat at the front and bell-shaped hem. V-neck, dropped shoulders, yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Slightly longer at the back.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs.
Long-sleeved cardigan in soft, textured-knit cotton with a round neckline, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
